https://discord.gg/vindictus]Discord[/url]!



[h3]Rewards[/h3]
[list]
[*] [b]Participation Reward[/b]: VVIP (7 days) + In-Game Title "Veteran Mercenary"
[*] [b]Special Reward[/b]: Top 5 BEST step-by-step guide: NX 30,000 x5 Mercenary (NA+EU)
[/list]


[h3]Please Note:[/h3]
[list]
[*] Top 5 guides will be decided by Nexon Staffs.

[*] Upon announcement [b]additional procedures will take place[/b] for NX rewards.
[*] If we do not get a response [b]within a set period of time[/b

[b]Event period:[/b] 4/2/2024 - 4/16/2024


[h3]Event Info[/h3]

*Per-character event (Lv. 105+)

[b]Obtain the Lucky Sprint buff by conquering raids Battle of Rocheste (Cesar) - Sidhe Palace (Bres).[/b]
[list]
[*] The sprint boon has a total of 5 stages. 1 stage is added for completing each raid.
[*] The sprint boon is provided to all characters of Lv. 115 or below.
[*] Once the event begins, the sprint boon resets each day at 7AM UTC.
[/list]
